
unmonitor-instances
*******************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Disables monitoring for a running instance.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 unmonitor-instances
     --instance-ids <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-ids"  (list of string)
   The list of Amazon EC2 instances on which to disable monitoring.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
